description: Furtherance is a simple and intuitive offline time tracker. Think of it as a stopwatch with metadata. For my purposes, it works perfectly.
summary: Offline time tracking with an intuitive interface

description: The best part is you can continue tracking the same task, and it also track your start and stop time. The best of the best. The UI is very beautiful. Love love this app so much. Thank you dev, 10/10.
summary: The best time tracking app in the market!

description: useful timer for simple tasks export is available.

This app does the equivalent of what I used to use pen and paper for. It's very easy to integrate into your workflow: simply pin as 'always on top' resize the window as small as possible and stick it in a corner on a second monitor. I think the Generate Report feature could use a bit of polishing as I find it cumbersome to peruse a giant list, I would much prefer a tile system, however I have yet to use the Export as CSV feature so I think I can make what I am looking for using spreadsheets.

I have seen many improvments in my productivity. The most important one is that I can catch myself when I am neglecting a task that should have more priority. As a result, the problem I was trying to solve with pen and paper: meeting deadlines- even short ones, no longer feels as suffocating and is now managable.

Thanks for making this. It saved me the headache of making GUIs with python.
summary: Powerful, Intuitive to use, Keeps you focused

description:
Thank you for your effort.
Works as expected.
Easy and simple but with all you need for tracking, just what I wanted
I was looking for a simple timer. Tried every app on the store. This one is the most user-friendly and has such useful features didn't even know I needed them!
summary: Didn't even know I needed this

description:
App is really Good. Works as Expected. 
But maybe the idel timer is broken. I was on my laptop working the app still notified that you are idel. 
I am sure that I was working and app was open in Background Window.
Using Fedora Linux 39 (Workstation Edition) GNOME
summary: Good App to Know how much time you invested on a Skill or Task
